name: Vindictive Drive 2
description:
Tech Noir stealth action game with a story told via graphic novel format. The game contains stealth missions and action shooter stages with mech combat.

Story:

8 years have passed after Arris Fern's bloodthirsty revenge, as consequence of her actions, a bio-mechanical organism known as the Biokernel begins to devastate the planet, the story follows Arris' story trying to fix things as she avoids falling for her old habits, this time in the receiving end of vengeance.
Arris then finds Hex Reader, a former enemy who's now on a very similar path, they join forces to try and stop the bloodshed and solve a crime.

Playing Vindictive Drive 1 is not required to understand the plot.

Features:

  • Stealth based missions, using various tools and avoiding threats.
  • Story told in a graphic novel format with lots and lots of illustrations.
  • Mech action shooter instance where you pilot your battle frame while a robot servant(Maidbot) follows you around helping you as bizarre as that sounds, you get to explore the city, hunt down enemies and bosses, and use their parts for crafting.
  • Maidbot crafting.
  • Chatty characters.
  • The current build includes the Prologue, Chapter 1 and 2(of 10)
